snippet: Mead’s reputation is being restored as makers bring all of the refinements of a winery or craft brewery into their field.
abstract: Mead, once a staple of so many cultures, faded into such ignominy that most of us know it as only something poured by a guy in a funny hat at a Renaissance Faire; but now its reputation is being restored as makers bring all of the refinements of a winery or craft brewery into their field; mead brewers listed.
lead_paragraph: Mead’s reputation is being restored as makers bring all of the refinements of a winery or craft brewery into their field.

headline.main: So Old It’s New, Mead Enjoys a Renaissance
headline.print_headline: So Old It’s New, Mead Enjoys a Renaissance
